# level1.txt
#
# File format:
#  Comments have # as the first character in the line, and end at a newline.
#  Each section starts with a word followed by a : and a newline, and ends
#  with a blank line.
#  Extra blank lines are ignored.
#  Colors are in the form R G B where each compononent is an integer in the
#  range 0-255.
#
# Feel free to edit these for fun!
#

map:

superdots:
(2.5, 4) (18.5, 4) (2.5, 17.5) (18.5, 17.5)

start_pos:
yellow = (10, 17)
red = (10, 9)
pink = (10, 11)
blue = (9, 11)
orange = (11, 11)

ghost_hotel:
inside = (10, 11)
outside = (10, 9)

wall_color:
